choose.when: insert into board values (null, #{title }, #{contents }, 0, now(), (select ifnull(max(g_no), 0) + 1 from board a ), 1, 0, #{userId })

mapper.select: select id, title, contents, g_no as groupNo, o_no as orderNo, depth, user_id as userId from board where id = #{id }

choose.when: select a.id, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_id as userId from board a, user b where a.user_id = b.id order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{size }
choose.otherwise: select a.id, a.title, a.hit, date_format(a.reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %p %h:%i:%s') as regDate, a.depth, b.name as userName, a.user_id as userId from board a, user b where a.user_id = b.id and (title like '%${keyword }%' or contents like '%${keyword }%') order by g_no desc, o_no asc limit #{startIndex }, #{size }
select count(*) from board where (title like '%${_parameter }%' or contents like '%${_parameter }%')
